originalError.name: ValidationFailed

settings.helpText: Use this for the optional text that shows up at the top of some old index pages
Select any content that appears under this in the navigation - for example, the pages that will appear on an index
Box list is the old style of index page, like the benefits index. Text list is the newer style, like consumer.
Leave this blank to keep it the same as the public meta description
Selecting 'yes' hides this collection from Google, internal search and our website navigation. People will only be able to reach it from a direct url

Box list is the old style of index page, like the benefits index. Text list is the newer style, like consumer. List subheading is for what used to be 'Beta page groups' - the ones that aren't pages, just subheadings on text lists.
Adds an adviser-only sticky box to the top of the page, like on the immigration public pages

errors.details: Multiple controls are mapped to the same field
